headline: 🟡 Me(n)tal Health Advocate 🟡 🎯 Mission: Access to affordable education for everyone with LEADY! | Follow for 🇩🇪 & 🇺🇲 Content & inspiration that ROCKS!!!
about:
Welcome to my LinkedIn page ☺

Thank you for your interest!

My name is Christina Earlymorn and with my account here I am an advocate for Me(n)tal Health.

On here, I combine 3 things:

🟡 1) My love for Heavy Metal Music.
🟡 2) My love for being well dressed.
🟡 3) My personal story as an bullying & s*xual abuse survivor which I use to create inspirational & helpful content as added value to bring more to the table as just music.


🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨


My fire & mission:

My 🔥 is to spread my personal knowlede on how to deal with the personal aftermath bullying & s*xual abuse/molestation can bring with.

🎯 My Mission: Access to modern education at an affordable price, which is available to everyone worldwide through the plattform called LEADY.


🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨


Maybe you ask yourself: "Why Heavy Metal?" (Feel free to read my short Bio)

Born in 1990 in lower Bavaria, Germany. I grew up in an christian conservative household.

Because I was a trans 🏳️‍⚧️ kid back in 1996 I was bullied by the kids in class & was molested and s*xually abused by a catholic nun which I had as a handycraft teacher from 1996 until 1998.

As an outlet for my pain I started to play the guitar after I discovered Heavy Metal hearing Metallica on the radio in the 2000's.

That's where my journey began.


🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨


Some hard facts about me:

● I am a trained painter/airbrusher for cars and also a trained & registered geriatric nurse for the elderly.
● I worked as a teamleading nurse. I managed the shifts for my coworkers by planning these every month.
● After Covid I fully switched into the office.
● I have written my first book in 2020 and work on my 3rd.
● My music is on:
https://www.christinaearlymorn.com


🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨


Skills:

● Motivational & psychosocial teamleading by having strong emphathy as strong as the ability to lead in difficult situations.
● My word I hold. On time I am.
● I have multiple extra courses in personal developement under my belt + a certification as Coach.
● I play music on 5 instruments, have brought knowledge in audio recording, mixing & mastering.
● An eye for style, design & aesthetics.


🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨


Feel free to follow me for inspirational content that goes way beyond Heavy Metal and the spikes!

Be sure to watch my posts 😉





🅰️𝐓 𝐌𝐘 𝐎𝐅𝐅𝐈𝐂𝐈𝐀𝐋 𝐖𝐄𝐁𝐒𝐈𝐓𝐄
👉 www.christinaearlymorn.com 👈
you can 𝙡𝙚𝙖𝙧𝙣 more.
Show less

headline: Senior Account Manager PR & Communications/ Global Communication Experts
about:
* Zielgruppenspezifisches Recherchieren und Schreiben.
* Aufbau und Pflege von relevanten Beziehungen zu verschiedenen Anspruchsgruppen

*Koordination und Umsetzung und Wissensaustausch
* Entwicklung, Umsetzung und Betreuung von internen/externen Projekten und Aktionen.
* Gespür für aktuelle und relevante Themen/Entwicklungen - intern und extern.
* Redaktionelles Know-How sowohl für Print- als auch Onlineprodukte.

* Kontakte zu Entscheidungsträgern innerhalb Touristik, z.B. Airlines, Hotelketten Reiseveranstaltern, Destinationen, Reedereien u.a.

* Fundiertes Wissen über die Reisebranche sowie über Zusammenhänge zu Wirtschaft und Politik.
